amendatorysection.catchline: Paramedic practice of out-of-hospital emergency medical care, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Paramedic practice of out-of-hospital emergency medical care means care provided in accordance with the knowledge and skill acquired through successful completion of an approved program for a paramedic. Such care includes, but is not limited to, (1) all of the acts that an emergency medical technician-intermediate can perform, and (2) surgical cricothyrotomy.
